Articles.Content:
I'm trying to get my new Saitek/Logitech 3-throttle device to work properly, but when I'm trying to use it to control thrust or brake limits, I'm having an issue where the throttle will accurately display 0-25, jump to 50, then jump to 75 and proceed normally through to 100. I've tried poking around in the Logitech Driver software that comes with the Quadrant, and I've tried messing with the settings in KSP, all to no avail. I've also double checked in the USB Controller Configuration thing in Windows, and all throttles smoothly display 0-100.

Has anyone encountered similar, or have any advice?
Is it an old device? Because it sounds to me as a dirty old potentiometer. You could try to use one of the other axes (the red or blue one) to see if the problem is also present on those.
